I went to the convention center today and of course parked in the parking garage. yikes! this is the only parking garage I have ever been in (and I have been in plenty) and larger ones too. where are the yellow lines? any directions? signs? going up after paying the attendant a guy was driving down IN THE MIDDLE towards me. people were driving here and there, are there ever going to be any arrows, lines etc?

AN ACCIDENT WAITING TO HAPPEN
